meanings.definition: The position or rank of an emperor.
meanings.sent1: In ancient times, many people aspired to achieve emperorships.
meanings.sent2: The emperorships of powerful rulers often lasted for many years.
meanings.sent3: The competition for emperorships was fierce among the royal families.
meanings.sent4: His influence in the business world was so vast that he held multiple emperorships.
meanings.sent5: The grandeur and authority of emperorships were evident in the elaborate ceremonies.

meanings.definition: The term of office or reign of an emperor.
meanings.sent1: During his emperorships, the empire experienced great prosperity.
meanings.sent2: The emperorships of wise leaders brought stability to the kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The emperorships of the past were filled with tales of intrigue and betrayal.
meanings.sent4: His emperorships over the company led to unprecedented growth and success.
meanings.sent5: The emperorships of history are often romanticized in epic tales and legends.
